alert.note: Alert for Inland Jackson; Inland Matagorda; Wharton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 5:32PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Wharton, east central Jackson and northern Matagorda Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 531 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pierce, or near El Campo, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... El Campo, Pierce, Louise and Danevang. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
